title: For Sale - T205 Ty Cobb - PSA 3 Polar Bear Reverse - SOLD
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: For Sale - T205 Ty Cobb - PSA 3 Polar Bear Reverse - SOLD
posts.post_content:
For your consideration is this T205 TY COBB - SOLD

The card has been graded PSA 3 – Very Good.  It has a horizontal crease through the Ty Cobb nameplate.

ASKING $3800, delivered, NET TO ME, please.

Please note that an "I'LL TAKE IT!" takes precedence over any on-going negotiation.
